pageProduct.name: Thompson's Organic Iron 24mg 30 Tablets
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Thompson's Organic Iron Helps maintain healthy blood.

Thompson's Organic Iron is a blood tonic that helps maintain normal blood in healthy individuals and is useful during pregnancy when a woman's iron need increases. It may assist with the management of dietary iron deficiency. Iron is necessary for the formation of haemoglobin which transport oxygen to the tissues.

Size: 30tabs

Oil-Free?: Yes

KEY FEATURES

• Helps maintain normal blood in healthy individuals
• Useful during pregnancy when a woman's iron need increases
• May assist with the management of dietary iron deficiency
• Vegetarian/Vegan friendly

Warnings

If symptoms persist consult your healthcare professional. Vitamins supplements should not replace a balanced diet. Not for the treatment of iron deficiency.

Ingredients

Active Ingredients: Each tablet contains: Iron (as Amino Acid Chelate) 24mg
Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C) 30mg
Folic Acid 100mcg
Cyanocobalamin (Vitamin B12) 2mcg

Directions

Store below 30°C in a dry place. Do not use if bottle and/or cap seal is missing or broken. Keep out of reach of children.

Storage Temperature: Below 30°C

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
